name: Eternal Void
author: Sacred Shifter Collective
description: Confrontation with the infinite emptiness that precedes form. A meditation on the pregnant void where all potential resides. Black becomes luminous. Silence becomes deafening. Surrender to the nothing that contains everything.
metaphysicalNotes: The void is not empty but full of unmanifest potential. This pack guides the practitioner through ego dissolution into the primordial darkness where all creation begins.
